ComicInfo.Summary: Shadows Beneath the City Dr. Julien Saunière penetrates the highest ranks of the Paris underworld on his quest to find the stolen medieval scroll that cost the life of his best friend Father Gérard Marin. The hunt for the scroll literally takes Julien to the lowest depths of the city. Meanwhile, Genevieve uncovers a clue to the meaning of the mysterious Latin phrase "Et in Arcadia Ego" in the palace of the Duke of Lorraine...
